One of the most important things a man can do is to take care of his [health](https://www.muscleandfitness.com/features/edge/8-scariest-american-health-facts/). Sure, [working out](https://www.muscleandfitness.com/workout-plan/workouts/workout-routines/complete-mf-beginners-training-guide-plan/) and [ eating right](https://www.muscleandfitness.com/muscle-fitness-hers/hers-nutrition/beginners-guide-clean-eating/) are solid starts—and they're definitely part of a [healthy lifestyle](https://www.muscleandfitness.com/workouts/workout-tips/13-things-every-fitness-beginner-needs-know/)—but adding in some [natural herbal supplements](https://www.muscleandfitness.com/supplements/recover/5-best-all-natural-supplements-workout-recovery/) is a great idea as well. Unlike pharmaceuticals that are manufactured with a host of unhealthy additives and also the source of some nasty side effects, herbs present an all-natural solution to common ailments that has been proven through centuries-long use. Whether you suffer from depression, [sexual performance](https://www.muscleandfitness.com/nutrition/11-foods-spice-your-sex-life/), hair loss or any other issues common to men, there is definitely an herb for that.
